```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(DT)
library(data.table)
library(reshape)
library(reshape2)
```

```{r setup-2, include=FALSE}
#Data Cleanup
pitch_data <- read.csv("Data.csv")
pitch_data <- pitch_data %>% 
  subset(select = -c(X, X.1, X.2, X.3)) %>%
  drop_na()
glimpse(pitch_data)
colnames(pitch_data)
```

Pitcher ID: 1 {data-navmenu="Pitchers"}
=======================================================================

Row
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Tunneling Map for Pitcher ID 1

```{r}
#tunneling graph
p1_tunneling <- ggplot(data = pitcher1, 
                       aes(x = ReleasePositionX, y = ReleasePositionY, color = PitchType)) + 
  geom_point(size = 2, alpha = 0.50) + 
  xlim(0, -4) + 
  ylim(51, 55) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(x = "Release Side (in)", y = "Release Height (in)") + 
  ggtitle("Pitcher ID 1 - Pitch Tunneling") + 
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 20), 
        panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 16),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 16),
        axis.title.x = element_text(size = 18),
        axis.title.y = element_text(size = 18), 
        legend.title = element_text(size = 16), 
        legend.text = element_text(size = 14))
ggplotly(p1_tunneling)
```

### Movement Plot for Pitcher ID 1

```{r}
movement_p1 <- ggplot(data = pitcher1, 
       aes(x = TrajectoryHorizontalBreak, y = TrajectoryVerticalBreakInduced, color = PitchType)) + 
  geom_point(size = 2, alpha = 0.50) + 
  xlim(-2, 2) +
  ylim(-2, 2) + 
  labs(x = "Horizontal Break", y = "Induced Vertical Break") + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  ggtitle("Pitcher ID 1 - Pitch Movement") + 
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 20),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 16),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 16),
        axis.title.x = element_text(size = 18),
        axis.title.y = element_text(size = 18), 
        strip.text = element_text(size = 16), 
        legend.title = element_text(size = 16), 
        legend.text = element_text(size = 14))

ggplotly(movement_p1)

```

Row
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Pitch Breakdown for Pitcher ID 1

```{r}
pitchTypes_p1 <- c("FF", "FC", "SL", "CU", "CH")
FF <- pitcher1 %>% subset(PitchType == "FF")
FC<- pitcher1 %>% subset(PitchType == "FC")
SL <- pitcher1 %>% subset(PitchType == "SL")
CU <- pitcher1 %>% subset(PitchType == "CU")
CH <- pitcher1 %>% subset(PitchType == "CH")

FFtotal <- nrow(FF)
FCtotal <- nrow(FC)
SLtotal <- nrow(SL)
CUtotal <- nrow(CU)
CHtotal <- nrow(CH)

FFballs <- NROW(which((FF$PitchCall == "ball") | (FF$PitchCall == "blocked_ball")))
FCballs <- NROW(which((FC$PitchCall == "ball") | (FC$PitchCall == "blocked_ball")))
SLballs <- NROW(which((SL$PitchCall == "ball") | (SL$PitchCall == "blocked_ball")))
CUballs <- NROW(which((CU$PitchCall == "ball") | (CU$PitchCall == "blocked_ball")))
CHballs <- NROW(which((CH$PitchCall == "ball") | (CH$PitchCall == "blocked_ball")))

FFstrikes <- FFtotal - FFballs
FCstrikes <- FCtotal - FCballs
SLstrikes <- SLtotal - SLballs
CUstrikes <- CUtotal - CUballs
CHstrikes <- CHtotal - CHballs

balls <- c(FFballs, FCballs, SLballs, CUballs, CHballs)
strikes <- c(FFstrikes, FCstrikes, SLstrikes, CUstrikes, CHstrikes)
pitches <- c(FFtotal, FCtotal, SLtotal, CUtotal, CHtotal)

breakdown_p1 <- data.table("Strikes" = strikes, 
                           "Balls" = balls, 
                           "Total" = pitches)
DT::datatable(breakdown_p1, rownames = pitchTypes_p1)
```
### Summary for Pitcher ID 1

Demonstrated good tunneling with all pitches. 
Above average tunneling on CH and FF/FC. 
FF had good rise, gyro SL, +shape on CU, sinking CH. 
Able to throw FF and FC for strikes. 
Demonstrated ability to throw all offspeed for strikes.
